short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts English characters to Greek equivalents with tooltip

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension converts visible English characters on web pages into their Greek equivalents. It's a fun way to give any webpage a Greek flair!
